json.sql:
WITH __transaction AS (
  SELECT
    amount,
    transaction_timestamp
  FROM resume_ai_db.img_recg.transaction
)
SELECT
  TO_CHAR(transaction_timestamp, 'YYYYMM') AS yearmonth,
  SUM(amount) AS total_amount
FROM __transaction
GROUP BY
  TO_CHAR(transaction_timestamp, 'YYYYMM')
ORDER BY
  TO_CHAR(transaction_timestamp, 'YYYYMM')
 -- Generated by Cortex Analyst
;

This is our interpretation of your question:
